title: Evolution vs. God: Shaking the Foundations of Faith (2013)

cast.name: Gail Kennedy
cast.character: Herself - Associate Professor, Anthropology, UCLA       (as Gail E. Kennedy PhD)

cast.name: Paul Zachary Myers
cast.character: Himself - Associate Professor, Biology, University of Minnesota Morris       (as PZ Myers PhD)

cast.name: Peter Nonacs
cast.character: Himself - Professor, Ecology and Evolutionary Biology, UCLA       (as Peter Nonacs PhD)

cast.name: Craig Stanford
cast.character: Himself - Professor, Biological Sciences and Anthropology, USC       (as Craig Stanford PhD)

cast.name: Emeal Zwayne
cast.character: Himself - Executive Vice President, Living Waters       (as Emeal 'E.Z.' Zwayne)

overview: Many believe that Darwinian evolution is a scientific fact. This movie shows it is unscientific by interviewing evolutionary scientists from UCLA and USC as well as biology majors.
storyline: Ray Comfort makes a case for creationism, combined with a few snapshots of expert testimony from leading evolutionary scientists at some of the world's top universities.
